Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Respiratory Viral Panel and BD Respiratory Viral Panel-SCV2 for BD MAX System—multiplexed RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex detection of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV nucleic acid in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swabs from individuals with signs/symptoms of respiratory infection; aids differential diagnosis when used with other clinical information
